verses.verse: And it came to pass after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Who shall go up <S%H5927><s%> for us first <S%H8462><s%> against the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, to fight against them <S%H3898><s%>?
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall go up <S%H5927><s%>: behold <S%H5414><s%>, I have delivered the land <S%H776><s%> into his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Simeon <S%H8095><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>, Come up <S%H5927><s%> with me into my lot <S%H1486><s%>, that we may fight <S%H3898><s%> against the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>; and I likewise will go <S%H1980><s%> with thee into thy lot <S%H1486><s%>. So Simeon <S%H8095><s%> went with him <S%H3212><s%>.

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%>; and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%> into their hand <S%H3027><s%>: and they smote <S%H5221><s%> of them in Bezek <S%H966><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%>.

And they found <S%H4672><s%> Adoni-bezek <S%H137><s%> in Bezek <S%H966><s%>; and they fought <S%H3898><s%> against him <S%H5221><s%>, and they smote the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%>.

But Adoni-bezek <S%H137><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%>; and they pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him <S%H270><s%>, and caught him <S%H7112><s%>, and cut off his thumbs <S%H931><s%> and his great toes <S%H7272><s%>.

And Adoni-bezek <S%H137><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%>, having their thumbs <S%H931><s%> and their great toes <S%H7272><s%> cut off <S%H7112><s%>, gathered <S%H3950><s%> their food under my table <S%H7979><s%>: as I have done <S%H6213><s%>, so God <S%H430><s%> hath requited <S%H7999><s%> me <S%H935><s%>. And they brought him to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and he died there <S%H4191><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> against Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and took <S%H3920><s%> it <S%H5221><s%>, and smote it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and set <S%H7971><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> on fire <S%H784><s%>.

And afterward <S%H310><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the hill-country <S%H2022><s%>, and in the South <S%H5045><s%>, and in the lowland <S%H8219><s%>.

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> against the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Hebron <S%H2275><s%> (now the name <S%H8034><s%> of Hebron <S%H2275><s%> beforetime <S%H6440><s%> was Kiriath-arba <S%H7153><s%>); and they smote <S%H5221><s%> Sheshai <S%H8344><s%>, and Ahiman <S%H289><s%>, and Talmai <S%H8526><s%>.

And from thence he went <S%H3212><s%> against the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Debir <S%H1688><s%>. (Now the name <S%H8034><s%> of Debir <S%H1688><s%> beforetime <S%H6440><s%> was Kiriath-sepher <S%H7158><s%>.)

And Caleb <S%H3612><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, He that smiteth <S%H5221><s%> Kiriath-sepher <S%H7158><s%>, and taketh <S%H3920><s%> it <S%H5414><s%>, to him will I give Achsah <S%H5915><s%> my daughter <S%H1323><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>.

And Othniel <S%H6274><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kenaz <S%H7073><s%>, Caleb <S%H3612><s%>'s younger <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%>, took <S%H3920><s%> it <S%H5414><s%>: and he gave him Achsah <S%H5915><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H935><s%>, when she came unto him <S%H5496><s%>, that she moved him to ask <S%H7592><s%> of her father <S%H1><s%> a field <S%H7704><s%>: and she alighted <S%H6795><s%> from off her ass <S%H2543><s%>; and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> said unto her <S%H559><s%>, What wouldest thou?

And she said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3051><s%>, Give me a blessing <S%H1293><s%>; for that thou hast set <S%H5414><s%> me in the land <S%H776><s%> of the South <S%H5045><s%>, give <S%H5414><s%> me also springs <S%H1543><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>. And Caleb <S%H3612><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> her the upper <S%H5942><s%> springs <S%H1543><s%> and the nether <S%H8482><s%> springs <S%H1543><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of the Kenite <S%H7017><s%>, Moses <S%H4872><s%>' brother-in <S%H2859><s%>-law, went up <S%H5927><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%> of palm-trees <S%H8558><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, which is in the south <S%H5045><s%> of Arad <S%H6166><s%>; and they went <S%H3212><s%> and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> with Simeon <S%H8095><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>, and they smote <S%H5221><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> that inhabited <S%H3427><s%> Zephath <S%H6857><s%>, and utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> it <S%H8034><s%>. And the name of the city <S%H5892><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Hormah <S%H2767><s%>.

Also Judah <S%H3063><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> Gaza <S%H5804><s%> with the border <S%H1366><s%> thereof <S%H831><s%>, and Ashkelon with the border <S%H1366><s%> thereof <S%H6138><s%>, and Ekron with the border thereof <S%H1366><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was with Judah <S%H3063><s%>; and drove out <S%H3423><s%> the inhabitants of the hill-country <S%H2022><s%>; for he could not <S%H3808><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the valley <S%H6010><s%>, because they had chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>.

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> Hebron <S%H2275><s%> unto Caleb <S%H3612><s%>, as Moses <S%H4872><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%>: and he drove <S%H3423><s%> out thence the three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> did not drive out <S%H3423><s%> the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%> that inhabited <S%H3427><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; but the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.
And the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, they also went up <S%H5927><s%> against Beth-el <S%H1008><s%>; and Jehovah was with them <S%H3068><s%>.

And the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> sent to spy <S%H8446><s%> out Beth-el <S%H1008><s%>. (Now the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> beforetime <S%H6440><s%> was Luz <S%H3870><s%>.)

And the watchers <S%H8104><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> come forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%>, and they said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H7200><s%>, Show us <S%H3996><s%>, we pray thee, the entrance into the city <S%H5892><s%>, and we will deal <S%H6213><s%> kindly with thee <S%H2617><s%>.

And he showed <S%H7200><s%> them the entrance <S%H3996><s%> into the city <S%H5892><s%>; and they smote <S%H5221><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>; but they let the man <S%H376><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> and all his family <S%H4940><s%>.

And the man <S%H376><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, and built <S%H1129><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> thereof Luz <S%H3870><s%>, which is the name <S%H8034><s%> thereof unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> did not drive out <S%H3423><s%> the inhabitants of Beth-shean <S%H1052><s%> and its towns <S%H1323><s%>, nor of Taanach <S%H8590><s%> and its towns <S%H1323><s%>, nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%> and its towns <S%H1323><s%>, nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Ibleam <S%H2991><s%> and its towns <S%H1323><s%>, nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Megiddo <S%H4023><s%> and its towns <S%H1323><s%>; but the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> would <S%H2974><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in that land <S%H776><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H3478><s%>, when Israel was waxed strong <S%H2388><s%>, that they put <S%H7760><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> to taskwork <S%H4522><s%>, and did not utterly <S%H3423><s%> drive them out <S%H3423><s%>.

And Ephraim <S%H669><s%> drove not out <S%H3423><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Gezer <S%H1507><s%>; but the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Gezer <S%H1507><s%> among them <S%H7130><s%>.

Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> drove not out <S%H3423><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Kitron <S%H7003><s%>, nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Nahalol <S%H5096><s%>; but the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> them <S%H4522><s%>, and became subject to taskwork.

Asher <S%H836><s%> drove not out <S%H3423><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Acco <S%H5910><s%>, nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Sidon <S%H6721><s%>, nor of Ahlab <S%H303><s%>, nor of Achzib <S%H392><s%>, nor of Helbah <S%H2462><s%>, nor of Aphik <S%H663><s%>, nor of Rehob <S%H7340><s%>;

but the Asherites <S%H843><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>; for they did not drive them out <S%H3423><s%>.

Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> drove not out <S%H3423><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Beth-shemesh <S%H1053><s%>, nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Beth-anath <S%H1043><s%>; but he dwelt <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>: nevertheless the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Beth-shemesh <S%H1053><s%> and of Beth-anath <S%H1043><s%> became subject to taskwork <S%H4522><s%>.

And the Amorites <S%H567><s%> forced <S%H3905><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> into the hill-country <S%H2022><s%>; for they would not suffer <S%H5414><s%> them to come down <S%H3381><s%> to the valley <S%H6010><s%>;

but the Amorites <S%H567><s%> would <S%H2974><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Heres <S%H2776><s%>, in Aijalon <S%H357><s%>, and in Shaalbim <S%H8169><s%>: yet the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> prevailed <S%H3513><s%>, so that they became subject to taskwork <S%H4522><s%>.
And the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> was from the ascent <S%H4608><s%> of Akrabbim <S%H4610><s%>, from the rock <S%H5553><s%>, and upward <S%H4605><s%>.
